$! Apply to HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) if you want to defer (delay) paying your self-employed National Insurance contributions. $!

If you defer, you won't overpay your National Insurance contributions because you'll pay what's due after the end of the tax year when the actual amount has been worked out. 

##Eligibility 

^ You must be both self-employed and employed if you want to defer. ^

For the 2012-13 tax year, you can defer Class 2 if you’re likely to earn more than £817 a week as an employee. 

You can defer Class 4 if you're likely to pay more than £3,278.75 for your Class 1, 2 and 4 contributions.

Use the [National Insurance calculator](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/calcs/nice.htm "National Insurance Calculator"){:rel="external"} to work out your contributions for the 2012-13 tax year. 

##How to defer

Send form CA72B to HMRC before the deadline. 

For the 2012 to 2013 tax year you must apply before 5 April 2013. If you apply after this date HMRC will only let you defer your Class 4 contributions. 

$D
[Download 'Form CA72B,  Apply to defer your National Insurance contributions - 2012 to 2013 tax year' (PDF, 95KB)](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/forms/ca72b-12-13.pdf "Download 'Form CA72B, Apply to defer your self employed NICs' (PDF, 95KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D
$D
[Download 'Form CA72B, Guidance notes - 2012 to 2013 tax year ' (PDF, 100KB)](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/forms/ca72b-notes-12-13.pdf "Download 'Form CA72B, Guidance notes' (PDF, 100KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

##Previous tax years 

For the 2011 to 2012 tax year - you've missed the deadline for Class 2 but you can still apply to defer Class 4. To do this send the [2011 to 2012 version of form CA72B](http://search2.hmrc.gov.uk/kb5/hmrc/forms/view.page?record=4_bCNCQuyao&formId=409 "2011 to 2012 version of form CA72B"){:rel="external"}  to HMRC.

For any other tax year - you've missed the deadline, but you may be able to [claim a refund from HMRC](/). 

##Where to send your forms

$A
National Insurance Contributions Office
Deferment Services
Longbenton
Newcastle upon Tyne
NE98 1ZZ
$A
